tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StockPortfolioOptimization (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
	date DATE NOT NULL,
	historical_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
	ai_algorithm_used VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_data (
    stock_id INT,
    stock_name VARCHAR(255),
    stock_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    market_cap DECIMAL(15, 2),
    volume INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE stock_recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT,
    stock_id INT,
    recommendation VARCHAR(255),
    confidence_score DECIMAL(5, 2),
    recommendation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE historical_market_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT,
    market_date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE StockPrices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    high_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    low_price DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE StockMetrics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    price_to_earnings_ratio DECIMAL,
    dividend_yield DECIMAL,
    market_cap DECIMAL,
    earnings_per_share DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE PortfolioHoldings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    current_value DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE OptimizationResults (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    optimization_score DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    recommended_actions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    price FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    transaction_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    price FLOAT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE portfolio_holdings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ai_models (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    model_type VARCHAR(20),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE optimization_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    optimization_date DATE,
    portfolio_id INT,
    performance_score FLOAT,
    optimization_details JSON
)
